summary: Site C has a 22% CDK4/6i utilization rate for Medicare patients, 16% below peer average. Connecting Medicare patients to assistance programs could yield $68,000/year.

clinical_impact.description: Improving Medicare utilization at Site C increases survival.

peer_comparison.description: Medicare peer average across sites is 38%.

action_steps: Implement Medicare financial assistance navigator at Site C
Review Site C workflow for Medicare eligibility
Share Medicare coverage resources with Site C providers
suggestions: Partner with Medicare Advantage plans for better CDK4/6i coverage

drilldowns.label: Variance by Provider
drilldowns.cohort: ER+/HER2- MBC, 2L, Medicare, Site C, by Provider
